data.name: Kbyte Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Original Soundtrack for Kbyte composed by FOKO (Emilio Martinez). The soundtrack includes 17 tracks in "192kbps MP3's" format.
Once purchased, files will be located in "Steam\steamapps\common\KByte\OST\"

Tracklist:
1. BitoBit 02:17
2. K-Life! 01:42
3. Byte! 01:24
4. CRAZyBIT! 03:39
5. Hi!BytE 03:28
6. InsertCoin 02:22
7. KbyteJump 02:41
8. Microchip 03:18
9. PiX 02:30
10. Kbyte-Hero 03:36
11. Orders 01:09
12. The Call 00:57
13. Follow Kbyte 01:10
14. Evil Boss 01:42
15. The True 00:52
16. Road to Castle 02:15
17. End&Start 01:56

data.short_description: Original Soundtrack for Kbyte composed by FOKO (Emilio Martinez). 17 original tracks included.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP and above
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD eqv
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Needed

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD eqv
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Needed

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD eqv
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Needed
